mcq.question: Which scheduling algorithm is non-preemptive?
mcq.explanation: FCFS (First Come First Serve) is non-preemptive.

mcq.question: Which algorithm is best for minimizing average waiting time (ideal case)?
mcq.explanation: SJF tends to minimize average waiting time when burst time is known.

short.question: Define waiting time in CPU scheduling.
short.answer: Waiting time is the total time a process spends in the ready queue waiting for CPU.

short.question: What is turnaround time?
short.answer: Turnaround time is the total time from submission/arrival of a process to its completion.
